artist: Painter: After Sir Godfrey Kneller; Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars
description: half length portrait of man turned left and looking back over right shoulder; wearing a soft turban-like hat, jacket, vest and white shirt; in a circular composition
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black : p.368 / G. Kneller pinx.   T. Chambars sculp. / JOHN BAPTIST MONOYER | on sheet  in pencil: 2-84 | on mount upper right corner in pencil: 118
title: Portrait of John Baptist Monoyer
